member.name: T:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel
member.summary: Třída reprezentující RSS channel

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor nutný pro XmlSerializer. Nutno nastavit required položky Title, Link a Description.

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor s povinnými položkami.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.Title
member.summary: The name of the channel. REQUIRED Element.
member.remarks: It's how people refer to your service. If you have an HTML website that contains the same information as your RSS file, the title of your channel should be the same as the title of your website.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.Link
member.summary: The URL to the HTML website corresponding to the channel. REQUIRED Element.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.Description
member.summary: Phrase or sentence describing the channel. REQUIRED Element.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.Language
member.summary: The language the channel is written in. Pro češtinu je "cs", popř. "cs-CZ".
member.remarks: This allows aggregators to group all Italian language sites, for example, on a single page. A list of allowable values for this element, as provided by Netscape - http://blogs.law.harvard.edu/tech/stories/storyReader$15 You may also use values defined by the W3C - http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/struct/dirlang.html#langcodes

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.Copyright
member.summary: Copyright notice for content in the channel.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.ManagingEditor
member.summary: Email address for person responsible for editorial content.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.WebMaster
member.summary: Email address for person responsible for technical issues relating to channel.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.PubDate
member.summary: The publication date for the content in the channel.
member.remarks: For example, the New York Times publishes on a daily basis, the publication date flips once every 24 hours. That's when the pubDate of the channel changes. All date-times in RSS conform to the Date and Time Specification of RFC 822, with the exception that the year may be expressed with two characters or four characters (four preferred). http://asg.web.cmu.edu/rfc/rfc822.html

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.LastBuildDate
member.summary: The last time the content of the channel changed.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.Category
member.summary: Specify one or more categories that the channel belongs to. Současná implementace umožňuje zadat pouze jednu kategorii a to ještě bez zadání domény (domain atribut).
member.remarks: Follows the same rules as the ITEM-level category element.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.Generator
member.summary: A string indicating the program used to generate the channel.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.Ttl
member.summary: Time to Live. It's a number of minutes that indicates how long a channel can be cached before refreshing from the source.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.Rating
member.summary: The PICS rating for the channel. http://www.w3.org/PICS/

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.Image
member.summary: Specifies a GIF, JPEG or PNG image that can be displayed with the channel.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel.Items
member.summary: Kolekce jednotlivých prvků ITEM.

member.name: T:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssImage
member.summary: Třída reprezentující RSS prvek "image"

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssImage.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor musí být kvůli XmlSerializeru. Nutné zadat Url, Title a Link.

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssImage.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor s povinnými prvky elementu Image.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssImage.Url
member.summary: URL of a GIF, JPEG or PNG image that represents the channel. REQUIRED.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssImage.Title
member.summary: Describes the image, it's used in the ALT attribute of the HTML "img" tag when the channel is rendered in HTML. REQUIRED.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssImage.Link
member.summary: The URL of the site, when the channel is rendered, the image is a link to the site. REQUIRED.
member.remarks: Note, in practice the image "title" and "link" should have the same value as the channel's "title" and "link".

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssImage.Width
member.summary: Width of the image in pixels. Maximum value for width is 144, default value is 88.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssImage.Height
member.summary: Height of the image in pixels. Maximum value for height is 400, default value is 31.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssImage.Description
member.summary: Contains text that is included in the TITLE attribute of the link formed around the image in the HTML rendering.

member.name: T:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssFeed
member.summary: Hlavní třída reprezentující celý RSS dokument. RSS verze 2.0 Specifikace na http://blogs.law.harvard.edu/tech/rss

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssFeed.#ctor
member.summary: Vytvoří novou instanci RSS feedu.

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssFeed.SerializeToXmlDocument
member.summary: Vrátí RSS feed jako XmlDocument

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssFeed.ToString
member.summary: Vrátí RSS feed jako String s XML dokumentem

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssFeed.Version
member.summary: Atribut "version", nastaven na implementovanou verzi.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssFeed.Channels
member.summary: Kolekce channelů ve feedu.

member.name: T:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannelCollection
member.summary: Kolekce RssChannel prvků.

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannelCollection.Add(Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel)
member.summary: Přidá nový kanál do kolekce

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannelCollection.CopyTo(Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Zkopíruje kanály do array, na pozici index

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannelCollection.Insert(System.Int32,Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel)
member.summary: Vloží na určené místo v kolekci kanál.

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannelCollection.IndexOf(Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel)
member.summary: Vyhledá pozici kanálu v kolekci

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannelCollection.Remove(Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel)
member.summary: Odstraní kanál z kolekce.

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannelCollection.Contains(Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannel)
member.summary: Zjistí, zda-li se kanál nachází v kolekci
member.returns: true, pokud již kanál v kolekci existuje, jinak false

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssChannelCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Indexer zpřístupňující kanál na dané pozici kolekce.

member.name: T:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssItem
member.summary: Třída reprezentující RSS prvek "item".

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssItem.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor. Nutno nastavit Title, Link a Description !!!
member.remarks: Nutno zachovat kvůli XmlSerializeru, který vyžaduje přítomnost default constructoru.

member.name: M:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssItem.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Vytvoří RSS item s povinnými položkami

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssItem.Title
member.summary: The title of the item. REQUIRED.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssItem.Link
member.summary: The URL of the item. REQUIRED.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssItem.Description
member.summary: The item synopsis. REQUIRED.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssItem.Author
member.summary: Email address of the author of the item.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssItem.Category
member.summary: Includes the item in one or more categories. Současná implementace umožňuje zadání pouze jedné kategorie.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssItem.Comments
member.summary: URL of a page for comments relating to the item.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssItem.Guid
member.summary: A string that uniquely identifies the item. When present, an aggregator may choose to use this string to determine if an item is new.

member.name: P:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssItem.PubDate
member.summary: Indicates when the item was published.
member.remarks: If it's a date in the future, aggregators may choose to not display the item until that date.

member.name: T:Havit.Xml.Rss.RssItemCollection
member.summary: Kolekce RssItem prvků.

member.summary: Přidá nový item do kolekce

member.summary: Zjistí, zda-li je prvek v kolekci.
member.returns: true, je-li prvek v kolekci, jinak false

member.summary: Indexer na kolekci zpřístupňující prvek na požadované pozici.
